name: Hypnagogic
description:
Hypnagogic is about creating your own bed time story in order to fall asleep and wake up peacefully. Be cautious as failure might awaken the scary monster!

Music Credit 

Magic Scout Cottages by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4672-magic-scout-cottages
